subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ volatile closer returned to Citi Field after a two-game suspension and pitched for the first time since his arrest early Thursday on charges that he assaulted the grandfather of his 11-month-old twins.
snippet: The Mets’ volatile closer returned to Citi Field after a two-game suspension and pitched for the first time since his arrest early Thursday on charges that he assaulted the grandfather of his 11-month-old twins.
